Xixia county in Nanyang 南陽|南阳[Nan2 yang2], Henan

sentences.english: Xixia ruins belong to the Cretaceous period dinosaur rift sedimentary basin.
sentences.chinese: 西峡恐龙遗址属于白垩纪断陷盆地沉积。

sentences.english: Xixia county lies Funiu mountain, there is plenty of resource of graphite.
sentences.chinese: 西峡县地处伏牛山区，石墨矿藏资源十分丰富。
